lines.text:
[possesed]
Open the door, Rog. We don't want you, we want the bitch! You know we'd never hurt a nice little boy like you.
Go to hell, you dirty bastard!

[possesed]
Oh, not tonight my boy, not tonight. Rest assured we got something wonderful planned for you, so much pain, so much *sorrow*!
Eat a bowl of fuck! I am here to PARTY!
Run Judy, run! See Judy run!
Oh don't tell me you're leaving? Sal wanted to go... but he decided to stick around!
[shot of Sal with a wooden stake through his heart]
Do you guys have sour balls?
Why sure we do.
Too bad. I bet you don't get many blow jobs.
Oh Max, I don't bend that way.
Typical... Shut up and drive BITCH!

[shouts]
Come on! Your face looks fine. I have never seen anyone spend so much time in a mirror!
Relax! I just wanna look good for the boys. You did remember to invite some cute boys to the party I hope.
Of course I did, and we're gonna scare the shit out of them.
Blessed be the sinners, for the day of atonement is at hand.
Say what?

[shouts]
Festering fuckwads! You cannot take this bitch anywhere, man.

[they've just arrived at Hull House]
This place used to be a funeral parlor, wasn't it?
Yes. The biggest one of four counties.
A funeral parlor way our here?
Sure, its nice and cozy right next to the old cemetery. And rumor has it that Old Man Hull really loved his clientell. I mean in a carnal sense.
That doesn't surprise me. I once saw a portrait of Mrs. Hull.
I've heard stories about this place ever since I was a kid. The Hull Family met a pretty gruesome end, didn't they?

Sure did. As a matter of fact it was on Halloween night. One of them went crazy and slaughtered the entire family. Then committed suicide. They could never figure out who did it. Too much blood and guts.
I can't believe we're going to party here.

[sighs]
Neither can I.

[Jay's body is possessed by a demon now and his eyes gouged out]
Oh Jay no!

[Possessed]
Why has thou forsaken me?

[Possessed]
What's the matter Judy? Don't you like your blind date?

[pounding on the bathroom door]
Damn it bitch, c'mon! What'd you do, flush yourself down the fucking toilet or what?
I don't care what you all think, my daddy was a preacher, and I know better than to be in here fooling with this stuff. This is a house of the dead, and I"m getting out now before it's too late.
Ang, you can't really believe this place is posessed.
Nah, just reposessed!
Are you fat and dumb?
Judy, Rodger, where you going? The party's just begun.
Max, what're you doing?
I'm just checking out an old legend about this place, come here! Judy, come here, will ya? Come here, listen.

[uses his stethoscope on the ground by the brick wall sealing off the house]
Water!
Yeah, an underground stream. According to legend it completely surrounds the property, this wall was built right on top of it.
A brick wall on top of an underground stream? Now there's a stroke of engineering genius.
Well the wall was built to mark the stream, supposedly the evil spirits throughout the land can't cross over running water or something.

[entering Hull House, sickened by a rancid odor]
Whew! Somebody fired the maid!
Yeah, somebody did. The Hull family maid was killed along with the rest of them. Someone managed to roast her.
Great, barbecued maid. No wonder she didn't keep the place clean.

[Helen turns on a flash strobe]
Far fucking out!
I found it in my mother's closet, she used to be an acid head.
There's plenty of time for dancing later, now it's time for party games.
Yeah, we can play post orifice and you can be the stamp.
Don't make me ill.
I was thinking of something a bit more in tune with the holiday.
Like what? Bobbing for apples with razor blades in them?
No! I was thinking more along the lines of a seance.
A seance?

Isn't that a little chancy? I mean this IS Halloween, the night when all the creepy things are supposed to stalk the earth. I mean there's no telling what we'll drudge up, especially in this old place.
Hey guys, how about a past life seance?
A what?
A past life seance. You know, we all sit around, look in a mirror, and see our past lives.
What kind of drugs are we gonna need for this?
Cool.
[holds up her compact]
Will this do?
I'm afraid not, Suzanne, we need one we can all look into at once.

[everybody's sitting in front of a mirror for a past life seance]
It's really very simple, you just keep staring at my reflection in the mirror until the glass clouds up all black. When it clears we'll see what I looked like in a past life.
Those noises we heard, there were three of them, and that awful stink, and then the chill!
Well it's not cold now, must've been a draft.
Well, maybe somebody did come in.
The odor's gone too.
But we ALL experienced them! The noise, the stink, and the chill! They're all signs of demonic infestation.
Demonic what?
Demonic watchamacallit. I mean come on, ol' Ange here is just trying to put the ooooga booga on us, okay?
Yeah but even before the first white settlers colonized this area, this strip of land already had a bad rep.
Sure, Max.
Mm-mm, for centuries the ancient Indian tribes used to live around this area, would NEVER set foot on this side of the underground creek, even back then they said the land was unclean.
Right, Max, and I suppose the ghost of an ancient Indian told you that.
No, Mrs. Porter down at the library gave me a book about what the early settlers wrote, you cannot believe all the cool shit that used to go on down here.
Yeah, especially since they didn't have any indoor plumbing, right?

No, really. A young brave got lost and settled here with his family by mistake. Anyway, they found him three weeks later, sitting under a tepee he made of his squaw's intestines, and chewing on the leg of his papoose.
Oh gross!
I've never heard so many disgusting stories in all my life.
Typical.
Would you listen to me? These are NOT ghosts. This house is NOT haunted, it's possessed!
Ha! Possessed! Man! Come on it! Who gives a shit?
What's the difference in possessed and haunted?

A haunted house is a house with ghosts in it, the spirits of people who've died, but the spirits living in a house possessed never existed in human form. They've only existed in spirit form. They're pure evil. They're demons!
Wow, bodacious boobies, sis. You keep on going, you'll have to hire someone just to tie your shoes!
